pr_title: Ignore is a list for dependabot

timeline.message: Ignore is a list for dependabot

timeline.bodyText:
Proposing to add commons-beanutils to the list as part of this fix.  See PR-5124 and the recommendation from @basil

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
          
          
            
                  - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
          
          
            
                  - dependency-name: "commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils"
timeline.author: MarkEWaite
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,4 +9,4 @@ updates:
     schedule:
       interval: "daily"
     ignore:
-      dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
+      - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"

timeline.bodyText: BTW we should be including comments referring to written reasons for avoiding certain updates. For Groovy it is pretty well-known but for BeanUtils the issues in #4928 and #4328 were pretty technical.
timeline.author: jglick
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,4 +9,5 @@ updates:
     schedule:
       interval: "daily"
     ignore:
-      dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
+      - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
+      - dependency-name: "commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils"

replies.bodyText:
just wanted to fix dependabot in this PR,
comments added in #5130 feel free to debate / suggest phrasing
replies.author: timja
